attributes.action: Change TV licence fee law to only cover BBC channels.
attributes.additional_details:
Change TV licence law to only cover BBC channels.
All other broadcasters should be free to watch live.
attributes.background:
TV licence law should only cover channels from the BBC.
As the licence fee does not support any other broadcaster the law regarding live TV should only be in regards to BBC channels.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport
